input.sentences: the annual christmas light show was bigger than ever .
this year some ice sculptures were included .
is n't this adorable ? the fishing boy is made of ice .
meanwhile | my sister was looking at sculptures in a warmer climate .
she and her husband always spend the holidays someplace tropical .
output.sentences: We went to the Festival of Lights the night before Christmas, which was bigger than last years event.
Jarrod's wife was playful which included pretending to lick the ice sculptures!
She really loved the display in the gift shop showing a boy ice fishing.
Jarrod preferred the warmer looking sculpture which was much like one his Sisters had.
The both enjoyed the tropical room, and they did spend enough time there over the room that was themed after someplace in Norway.
